The United States Ambassador to Ukraine Bridget Brinka called for more defensive assistance against the backdrop of massive Russian shelling on Thursday.

“Starting from 03:18 local time, Russia launches missiles in the sovereign territory of Ukraine, despite the civilian population. The US is now needed to help Ukraine protect itself from an unjustified full -scale invasion of Russia, ”the ambassador wrote.

Bridget Brynk noted that this blow can also be regarded as a response to Russia for yesterday's meeting in Kiev directors of national security services from around the world to discuss the formula of Peace of Vladimir Zelensky. "

"Hypersonic rocket" dagger "in Kiev at 5:00 am, resulting in injured 10 civilians, including a child. We thank the brave defenders of Ukraine, ”the ambassador added.

On Wednesday in Kyiv there was a national security advisor Jake Sullivan. Hestatedthat Washington believes in the victory of Ukraine in the war with Russia. He assured that America will continue to provide defense assistance to Ukraine.
